resources.string: Low scorers tend to be shutins.\n\nHigh scorers who score high tend to be more outgoing and social.
Low scorers tend to be more critical and aggressive.\n\nHigh scorers are more friendly and optimistic.
Low scorers are more impulsive and disorganized.\n\nHigh scorers are more careful and diligent.
Low scorers are more emotionally stable.\n\n High scorers are less emotionally stable.
Low scorers tend to be traditional and conventional.\n\nHigh scorers tend to like novelty, fantasy, and are more likely to be intellectually curious.
